title: [K-12] Design-Based Research Project for Learning Design Tool Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education design theory and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Validating the efficiency and usability of learning design tools through project-based assessments in language education

learning_goals: Learners can develop language education design tools by applying analog principles of Post-it note methods to digital environments
Learners can execute a tool development process in three stages (initial design-improvement-external evaluation) according to design-based research methodologies
Learners can submit project outcomes evaluating the usability and usefulness of developed tools in VR simulation environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
